text:
邀请函
兹因公司业务需要，邀请ABDULAZIZ NASER 来我公司进行商务考察，信息如下:
一、被邀请人信息:
姓名(英文):ABDULAZIZ NASER 性别:男
出生日期:1987年01月01日 国籍:土耳其 护照号码:U25035902
二、邀请信息:
邀请事由:邀请 ABDULAZIZ NASER 来我公司进行商务洽谈，时间从2024年10月22日至2024年11月21日。
trans:
Invitation Letter
Due to the needs of our company's business, we invite ABDULAZIZ NASER to come for a business visit. The information is as follows:
I. Information of the Invitee:
Name (English): ABDULAZIZ NASER, Gender: Male
Date of birth: January 1, 1987, Nationality: Turkey, Passport No.: U25035902
II. Invitation Information:
Purpose of invitation: We invite ABDULAZIZ NASER to come to our company for business negotiations. The time period is from October 22, 2024 to November 21, 2024.
